definitions.text: a short piece remaining on a trunk or stem where a branch is lost
a torn part of a ticket returned to the holder as a receipt
the part of a check that is retained as a record
the small unused part of something (especially the end of a cigarette that is left after smoking)
clear of weeds by uprooting them
strike (one's toe) accidentally against an object
examples: She stubbed her toe in the dark and now it's broken
